title: Watch Out Little Teddy
description: Little Teddy shows kids how to have fun while being frightened, because being safe is number one!
quote: Remember, kids. Please take care ’cause danger’s lurking!
altHero: Little Teddy stirring food on the stove
alt1: Teddy’s hands are bright red as they grab food from the oven
alt2: Teddy falling out of a window
alt3: Teddy being hit by a car
alt4: Teddy dancing inside a circle of children
